TopNav.profilenavdis: Welcome to the new Arzaq dashboard! Effortlessly manage your ads, memberships, drafts, and favorites, all in one convenient place.
TopNav.TipsforCreatingthePerfectListing: Tips for Creating the Perfect Listing
TopNav.TipsforCreatingDes: Follow these proven strategies to create listings that attract buyers and sell faster on ARZAQ.
TopNav.PicktheRightCategoryDes: Ensure your item appears in the right place by selecting the most appropriate category.
TopNav.CaptureAttentionWithQualityPhotosDes: Take clear, well-lit photos from multiple angles to showcase your item's best features.
TopNav.WriteaClearTitleDes: Create a concise, descriptive title that includes key details about your item.
TopNav.DescribeYourItemWellDes: Provide detailed, honest descriptions including condition, measurements, and unique features.
TopNav.PriceItRightDes: Research similar items to set a competitive price that attracts serious buyers.
TopNav.GetVerifiedDescription: Get verified to boost your trust and gain priority in search results.
TopNav.NeedHelp: Need help getting your membership or verified status? Verified users gain more trust and visibility, while memberships unlock exclusive features for your ads.
TopNav.VerificationHelp: If you have questions about the verification process or want to learn more about our membership options, our team is here to assist you. Reach out to us, and weâ€™ll guide you every step of the way to boost your ad performance and credibility.
TopNav.VerifiedDescription: Your account is verified and trusted. Enjoy the benefits of being a verified member.
TopNav.EditProfileDescription: Update your photo and personal details here.
TopNav.ProfilePhotoDescription: Click the camera icon to upload a new photo
TopNav.Name: Name
TopNav.IntroductionText: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal information, your privacy rights, and how the law protects you.
TopNav.PersonalIdentificationInfo: Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number)
TopNav.UsageData: Usage data (How you interact with our services)
TopNav.TechnicalData: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
TopNav.PrimaryUsesText: Providing and maintaining our service, Notifying you about changes to our service
TopNav.SecondaryUsesText: Improving customer service, Analyzing usage patterns
TopNav.DataProtectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
TopNav.EncryptionText: All data is encrypted during transmission
TopNav.AccessControlText: Strict access controls for employee data access
TopNav.RequestDeletionOfYourPersonalData: Request deletion of your personal data
TopNav.ContactUsText: For any privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact our Data Protection Officer at:
TopNav.AgreementText: By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.
TopNav.IntellectualPropertyText: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Your Company Name and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
TopNav.AllContentProperty: All content is the exclusive property of Your Company Name
TopNav.NoReproductionWithoutPermission: You may not reproduce or distribute any content without permission
TopNav.TrademarksProtection: Trademarks and logos are protected under intellectual property laws
TopNav.ServiceProvidedAsIs: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties, expressed or implied. We do not guarantee that our services will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. Your use of our services is at your sole risk.
TopNav.TerminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.
TopNav.NotifyingChanges: Notifying you about changes to our service
TopNav.ContactDescription: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the following channels.
TopNav.FAQsDescription:
Frequently asked question
Find answers to common questions about our services, account management, and payment processes.
TopNav.PostAdStep1: How do I post an advertisement?
TopNav.PostAdAnswer: To post an advertisement, log into your account and click on the 'Post Ad' button. Follow the simple steps to fill in your ad details, upload images, and submit for review.
TopNav.AdApprovalTime: How long does it take for my ad to be approved?
TopNav.AdApprovalAnswer: Usually, ads are reviewed and approved within 24 hours. However, during peak times or holidays, it might take up to 48 hours.
TopNav.EditAd: Can I edit my ad after posting?
TopNav.EditAdAnswer: Yes, you can edit your ad at any time by going to your dashboard and clicking on the 'Edit' button next to your ad.
TopNav.AdDuration: How long will my ad stay active?
TopNav.AdDurationAnswer: Ads remain active for 30 days by default. You can renew or repost your ad after this period.
TopNav.CreateAccount: How do I create an account?
TopNav.CreateAccountAnswer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button, fill in your details, verify your email address, and your account will be ready to use.
TopNav.ResetPassword: How can I reset my password?
TopNav.ResetPasswordAnswer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email.
TopNav.MultipleAccountsAnswer: No, we allow only one account per user to maintain quality and prevent spam.
TopNav.PaymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
TopNav.PaymentMethodsAnswer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and bank transfers for premium services.
TopNav.Refund: How do I get a refund?
TopNav.RefundAnswer: Contact our support team with your order details, and they will guide you through the refund process.
TopNav.HiddenFeesAnswer: No, all our fees are transparent and clearly displayed before you make any payment.
TopNav.FindAnswers: Find answers to common questions about our services, account management, and payment processes.
TopNav.ArzaqDescription: Arzaq is your go-to platform for buying and selling almost anything. Whether it's within your city or your neighborhood, the best deals are made locally. With Arzaq, it's simple to connect with buyers and sellers near you. Just select your region, and you're ready to explore! Posting an ad on Arzaq is quick and hassle-free, taking less than 2 minutes. Sign up for a free account to easily manage your ads anytime.
TopNav.ArzaqOffer: Arzaq offers the widest range of popular new and second-hand items across Kuwait. Whatever you're looking for, Arzaq makes it easy to find and connect.
TopNav.CreateAccountDescription: Sign up for free to start buying and selling effortlessly on Arzaq. Manage your ads with ease and connect with local buyers and sellers today!
TopNav.PostAnAdDescription: List your items in just minutes! Posting an ad on Arzaq is quick, easy, and completely free. Reach local buyers instantly!
TopNav.StartEarningDescription: Begin your journey today by posting ads on Arzaq! Sell your items locally and make extra income in no time. Sign up now and start earning!
TopNav.NoCommercialsMatchSearch: Oops! No Commercials match your search.
TopNav.TryAdjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.
